website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon D5300 D-SLR is a modest upgrade from the previous model, but it's just as worthy, making it our Editors' Choice for entry-level D-SLRs.
pros: 24-megapixel sensor with no optical low-pass filter
Excellent JPG detail at high ISO
cons: Will not autofocus with screw-drive lenses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry level DSLR with Pro features
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking online for a long time here on Amazon and also on the high street for this Camera. Had a few issues with the other sellers as they were selling Grey Imports of this camera. I had no choice but to buy it legit from Amazon and I'm glad that I did. The camera came with all the items, brand new and had the Nikon warranty and English manual and UK charge plug. I was able to register the camera on the Nikon website. The Camera is perfect for all your photography needs and has Professional features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for the camera itself, but had to return it because of the lack of EU warranty
customer_reviews.text: This 5 stars are for the camera itself. Awesome characteristics for the price and completely recommended. However, I had to return it because it did not include the Nikon European Warranty Card as advertised. The camera has a fantastic sensor of 24 megapixeles that would give you awesome picture definition, and it presents several updates from the D3300 model (I was considering that one at first). Among those I would stress: mobile screen with better resolution, AEB (you will need a tripod for the best results in this mode, specially at night), 39 AF points, etc. If it had included the EU warranty, I would have kept it without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Just the job !
customer_reviews.text: Just love it !!! ...After reading all the technical stuff from camera buffs and already being a Nikon owner there was only one option left..Buy one and i did. I've had my D5300 (coupled up with my existing Tamron 18-270mm lens) for almost a year now and can only say that its a great camera. Read all the tech stuff by all means but put simply its a fantastic piece of photographic equipment. More than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: while the d90 has a larger viewfinder and lcd settings screen that I always found handy I'm very pleased with the d5300
customer_reviews.text: I went from the d90 to the d5300, while the d90 has a larger viewfinder and lcd settings screen that I always found handy I'm very pleased with the d5300. It's got plenty of megapixels and is very sharp. the small size and weight makes it suited to travelling and it has lots of features such as time lapse, wi-fi, gps, very good full hd 50fps video with a decent amount of manual control, mic input, remote trigger input. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: A. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delighted now I have spent a couple of sessions getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Delighted now I have spent a couple of sessions getting used to it , this is my first SLR and I was a little daunted when I got it and the manual ! DON'T BE ! take a breather and it will all make sense I'm super pleased with the results so far and can't wait to take it on holiday, top tip if you find the manual too small to read clearly (the icons) you can down load it !
customer_reviews.author: AllieCat

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and on time. Camera is better than I thought after reading many reviews I dived in and bought it. I'm a complete novice when it comes to photography but the camera is well layed out and a breeze to use. Images are pin sharp with the stock 18=55mm lens and auto focus is fast and works nicely. Overall I'm extremely happy with the D5300 and would highly recommend it if your thinking of upping your game from a basic point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: alan woollett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade from my D60
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! A big step up from my D60 but very pleased with every aspect of it. The Nikon App is worth downloading to use WiFi transfer but the app does take some persevering with to get it working. Not the fault of the camera obviously! Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: McPearson

customer_reviews.title: Great for serious photographer still learning!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a budding photographer moving on from a bridge. An excellent product, Many features but still very user friendly. Great quality pics, comfortable to handle and a real bargain. May not be the very latest model in this range but is certainly one of the best. Thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: beaky1

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5300 is Wonderfull APS-C DSLR with internal GPS and WI-FI, makes perfect photos
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this DSLR camera. Originally it got my attention with one of the few with internal GPS for geo-tagging (something I insist and missing in d5600). But after you test it just for a 5 mins in shop or anywhere , the speed of focusing, the rotating screen overall feeling of it makes clear that Nikon used proven experience in building it. Oh and the most important - brilliant photos, seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Dimitar Mashev

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement camera for a broken one. Dead easy to use and enough controls to play with and learn how to do more than point and shoot. One of the plus is that being a popular model there is plenty of tutorials available. Wi-Fi, not really a Wi-fi, more like a Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: littlemice

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5300 as a good upgrade to D5100
customer_reviews.text: This camera is an upgrade to my previous Nikon D5100 and so far has come up to all expectations. The extras on board such as increased megapixel resolution are proving excellent but the Wifi and GPS I have not yet explored
customer_reviews.author: beporage

customer_reviews.title: Great value mid range DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I replaced d3100 with the d5300 and it is a massive improvement - wireless inbuilt and the photo quality is really impressive .
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of days ago and so far so good. It's a great camera for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I only bought it a couple of days ago and so far so good. It's a great camera for a beginner. Just a shame that the instruction manual was wholly in German. I was able to download an English version, so it wasn't too much of a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Woo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything good. Very fast delivery. product was fine and really good qualiy and easy to use. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A great camera. Its my first DSLR and something to ...
customer_reviews.text: A great camera. Its my first DSLR and something to grow into. I haven't managed to wifi to my mobile but that's for me to sort. The zoom is not great to definitely buy a good quality zoom lense rather than the kit if you are going on an adventure holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Majay

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and great service
customer_reviews.text: I brought this camera has a birthday treat for myself and to up grade the D40 camera i already have I am enjoying the new features and finding out more about the camera itself Pictures look really sharpe Product arrived within the deadline give and was well packaged and protected Really pleased with the service
customer_reviews.author: Peter Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Nikon qualities!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to receive this camera the day before the due delivery period began! Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Miss ES Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, I am very happy and it's highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hdeber

customer_reviews.title: D5300
customer_reviews.text: Really like this camera ! Does the job , takes great photos .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James Hannah

customer_reviews.title: great camara
customer_reviews.text: great camara. well worth its money. use it for a social events and picture quality compaired to d3200 is loads better even at high iso
customer_reviews.author: uksonic

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera but you would be better off with the d5500 if you have big hands
customer_reviews.author: B. Zabavnik

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera
customer_reviews.text: Used extensively on a family trip to Australia and very impressed with results. Lots of features and setting which took some getting used to (and I'm a long time Nikon user) but photos fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Duncan

customer_reviews.title: this was quickly rectified and it takes a brilliant picture. Got a few dry days to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the first order didn't come with the lens, this was quickly rectified and it takes a brilliant picture. Got a few dry days to take some photos and i am really impressed can't wait to start my new hobby
customer_reviews.author: richard higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, much better than my old D5100 still ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, much better than my old D5100 still light and easy to use,fits the hand beautifully, but the additions since the older version I have make it a better all round unit. The ability to down load pics to the phone via Wi Fi is great if you want to send them to a friend for instance.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Derrick

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad i went for this camera
customer_reviews.text: Since getting it ive used it for close up,mid range and everything else,Took me and some YouTube video's to work out some of the menu setting and now 1st class.,I'm glad i went for this camera.The phone app is a great addition allowing me to take photo's using phones wifi
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Shand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service (arrived fast), great camera... massive step up from my old camera. Many thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. R. A. Skupski

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from a Nikon D90
customer_reviews.text: this for me is a brilliant camera, just love it to bits, it is so easy to use and produces really good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Amey

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is light and a good step up from my D3100. It has realistic colours and good performance in low lights.
customer_reviews.author: MargotM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, never fails
customer_reviews.text: my favorite camera, so easy to use and really great quality photos! Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My first SLR what's not to like, does everything I need it to do as ...
customer_reviews.text: My first SLR what's not to like, does everything I need it to do as a biginner. It doesn't come with an SD card so you may want to get yourself one if your going to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and lens combination.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera and a perfect lens to take away with you, the 18-140mm provides plenty of coverage from wide to telephoto to tackle most scenes. Very pleased with inbuilt camera features for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Great price with amazon warehouse deal. Great pics quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: The camera was exactly as reviewed in NPhoto. The kicker was the great price. Saved over 150 euro on street price. Cash back was an added bonus. Used to take a 60+ group photo. Really impressed at the detail in faces.
customer_reviews.author: ny

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Stunning quality images, especially when paired with the Nikon AF-S DX NIKKOR 35mm f/1.8G Lens. Best camera I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Dovey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received this camera but have no cd or warranty card is this normal and did buy as new ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit for the price!... Well happy, light weight, robust construction and best of all... Brilliant photo's.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good pictures the weight is just right would have liked package to include lens hood and uv filter but consider it a great bargain
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: ... a total beginner and purchased this based on the great reviews. I'm very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I am a total beginner and purchased this based on the great reviews. I'm very happy so far, although it's taking time to understand the camera. I bought the guide book 'D5300 for Dummies' which is very useful, I then decided on a Nixon Nikkor 35mm lens for close ups and love it. I think the standard lens it comes with is particularly good for landscapes and I needed a lens suitable for medical shots that needed to see detail, it's a sexy camera and lovely to use. I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.author: GD66

customer_reviews.title: A quick link to the full reference manual download.
customer_reviews.text: I have only just unpacked it and will give a full review later, it does feel wonderful, I did have a question about if it was capable of time lapse photography, it is, however if any of you wish to access the full reference manual, giving much more info than the correct manual, it can be downloaded here;
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Chances are if you're looking at this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Chances are if you're looking at this already then you have already done some homework on the exact specifications of it. It compares favourably to it's rivals and is nice and easy to use. What I was most interested in was the live video mode. For this it is absolutely fantastic and I won't be using my handycam that much from now on due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: After that the camera was perfect. 275 pages of instructions to browse through to ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within 4 days of order. It had been reboxed which made me a little suspicious but all parts were included. On startup Europe wasn't included in the zones, so to progress I indicated the zone as Canada. After that the camera was perfect. 275 pages of instructions to browse through to find my way around. GPS and WIFI enhance its features.
customer_reviews.author: Mikinik

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera which has many good features and takes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera which has many good features and takes a lovely photograph. It is lightweight and easy to carry when out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Wils

customer_reviews.title: Great little entry level DSLR with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: Great little entry level DSLR with a lot of features, feels lightweight due the materials it is made of, but enjoying using it so far
customer_reviews.author: awj

customer_reviews.title: Best Digital SLR for non professional users
customer_reviews.text: For sure one of the best Digital SLR option for non professional users. I really love it and got it for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Serafim

customer_reviews.title: fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures and easy to change to video when needed. As I have upgraded from D40 I find the controls are similar.It would be better if it came with extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Chimneysweep

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I have started taking pictures and really like the quality Delivery timescales were excellent Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ginnever

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Xmas present and my husband fell in love with it immediately. Bought a SanDisk 32 GB memory card 60 Mb/s with it. Maybe a 55-300 lens would make it even better. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Den-Boros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera great just as described, the only problem was the instructions were in German?
customer_reviews.author: ians

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant - delivered on time and just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Smad

customer_reviews.title: Really inpressed
customer_reviews.text: A really great camera, very pleased with it, being a new person to SLR I found it very good, good reference book with it, how to use . Quick delivery, very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and compact for a mid range priced camera
customer_reviews.author: Alan Riches

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but instruction manual would be better if it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but instruction manual would be better if it was in English, sold into the UK it should have instructions in the English
customer_reviews.author: MR DAVID JOHN GARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my upgrade. A lot to learn but I'm getting there.
customer_reviews.author: Kingy

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5300
customer_reviews.text: I decided to upgrade my D5100 to this model. I liked the red colour body, albeit this is more expensive than the black body. The camera is an excellent item. I use it with a Tamron 18-300 lens and this gives great photos. A very good price via Amazon coupled with speedy delivery - what more would you want?
customer_reviews.author: James Craig

customer_reviews.title: GPS and WiFi disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The GPS geo-tagging is somewhat sporadic, tagging maybe 25% of shots, and not particularly accurate. There are times when it has put me 100 yards from where I was. (On the wrong side of a river, for example.) The Wi-Fi app on my Android (that is used to remotely control the camera) crashed my phone, though that is probably the app's fault rather than the camera's. Other than that it is a lovely camera. Very responsive. Great focusing. I have had some very pleasing results.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing my first DSLR I spent hours on the internet reading reviews and speaking with friends before deciding on the D5300. I purchased the "D5300 for Dummies" book at the same time to help me with the vast amount of features this camera has and I am already taking better pictures than I have ever before! This is a great high quality product - very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Graham B.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Camera for Film Makers/Bloggers and Video prodcers
customer_reviews.text: Do go check out my video review of this camera. I've added a list below to sum up the good and bad bits of the camera. I have also added some sample images I've taken from the camera. Pros -Flip out display -Excellent photo/video quality -Fun photography modes/features -Wifi and GPS -Huge range of lenses to work with -Compact design Cons -Mic jack broke -Expensive to repair -Nikon software is useless -GPS feature difficult to use -Nikon lenses expensive
customer_reviews.author: Davidson Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Top camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best digital SLR I have ever owned, I can't fault it I get great pleasure and stunning results every time I get it out of the bag. I absolutely love it. thanks NIKON
customer_reviews.author: stephen wimbleton

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - the Nikon cashback offer is not always applicable
customer_reviews.text: Whilst I am happy with the camera (minor lens discoloration markings but doesn't affect photos), the Nikon cashback offer that clearly shows on the product, is only valid if bought from Nikon through Amazon - NOT ANY OTHER MERCHANT! You need to read the 'smallprint' on the offer to figure this out - the offer should not show when not applicable!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Gibson

customer_reviews.title: brilliant camera, I have not had the time to ...
customer_reviews.text: brilliant camera, I have not had the time to use it so often, so looking forward to the spring and summer to realize it true potential.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Newitt

customer_reviews.title: Nikon d5300
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dslr camera, the image quality is amazing! I would strongly recommend this camera to any beginner/intermediate photographer. I find the wi-fi very useful to send images straight to my phone. Buy it and you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: james hales

customer_reviews.title: The WiFi and GPS are a great feature. Have not had time to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera replaces my 5100 - lighter and slightly smaller. The WiFi and GPS are a great feature. Have not had time to use it much yet but if it's as good as the 5100 I am sure it will be another great Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. R. Hewett

customer_reviews.title: well, no issues with this camera however, I ...
customer_reviews.text: well,no issues with this camera however, I have realised that I hardly used it ever since I purchased it because I seem to have started dis-liking DSLRS now. may be they are too bulky not only to carry but also to take out of my rucksack frequently to use. However, whatever photos I have shot using 5300, I can't find any fault with them.
customer_reviews.author: chandanprakash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful red camera
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful red camera, much better shade of red than in photo! They should make red lens too. That's one very good entry level body camera.
customer_reviews.author: Vellori A. C. N.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.........................................
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, excellent features, well made, excellent brand, I'm very amazed with its photos and video quality. I'm not agree they call it entry level DSLR. This is mid range DSLR with shining specs. I'm recommend it buy it
customer_reviews.author: Emess135

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for good money
customer_reviews.text: This camera does what I want it to as a novice and will take me into the future. I like the simplicity of the design, yet it's also future proofed ( until the next version comes along). Oh by the way it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: William Grant

customer_reviews.title: Back focus problems.
customer_reviews.text: These cameras have back focus issues. This is my second one and looks like it's going back to nikon :-(
customer_reviews.author: mr rui abreu

customer_reviews.title: Proper job.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a D3300 after it was damaged. Top marks to Lloyds Bank/Aviva insurance for sorting out a replacement via Amazon. A fantastic camera, so chuffed.
customer_reviews.author: whoosh

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Well Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressive bit of kit, looking forward to taking great pictures with its high specification.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stimson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera with lots of features, and a very good price. Delivery was bang on time but could have been a little bit quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Mr I.P.Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Only one fault - it doesn't have auto focus. Best camera I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona McRobb

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5300 with 18-55mm VRII collapsible lens...
customer_reviews.text: The camera has the latest expeed image processor, excellent rear screen and is very light, I bought the model with the new collapsible 18-55 vrII lens which is fantastic. The kit doesn't include a lens hood so I bought one direct from Nikon, the correct hood for the new lens is a HB-69, and I found it to be the cheapest at Nikon. The camera is brilliant and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B.Tarran

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for myself, and I am happy I did. Still in the early days of using it but it meets all my expectations and then some. I bought it after reading a lot of online reviews on camera magazine websites and their level of detail are a true likening for the product. Also a hats off to Amazon, I had a slight personal issue with my order and they managed to resolve it extremely quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Spiffing

customer_reviews.title: ... the entry level camera for DSLR's having been a great admirer of the D3200 this replacement camera pail the ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel this should be the entry level camera for DSLR's having been a great admirer of the D3200 this replacement camera pail the D3200 in to obscurity.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: GSP was one big disapointment. 8 hours to get ...
customer_reviews.text: GSP was one big disapointment. 8 hours to get location, which was far, far off. Night scene also a lillte disapointing. So I sendt it back.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Hansen

customer_reviews.title: On the paper everything looked great, i
customer_reviews.text: On the paper everything looked great, i.e. better than in my D60. However, photos taken by D5300 were often blurred and out of focus. I tried two different lens but it seems to be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz

customer_reviews.title: Nikon what can I say
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth camera in this range that I have bought it takes excellent pics with a little guidance from me
customer_reviews.author: J. Tomlinson
